verses.name: Job 28:18
verses.text: No mention shall be made of coral, or of pearls: for the price of wisdom is above rubies.

verses.name: Job 28:19
verses.text: The topaz of Ethiopia shall not equal it, neither shall it be valued with pure gold.

verses.name: Job 28:20
verses.text: Whence then cometh wisdom? and where is the place of understanding?

verses.name: Job 28:21
verses.text: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living, and kept close from the fowls of the air.

verses.name: Job 28:22
verses.text: Destruction and death say, We have heard the fame thereof with our ears.

verses.name: Job 28:23
verses.text: God understandeth the way thereof, and he knoweth the place thereof.
